mapper.select: SELECT re.recruit_no, re.com_no, subsubquery.mem_name, subsubquery.mem_gender, subsubquery.mem_birth, subsubquery.s_resume_no, subsubquery.mem_no, subsubquery.title, subsubquery.recruit_no, subsubquery.mem_recruit_no FROM recruit re join (SELECT m.mem_name, m.mem_gender, m.mem_birth, subquery.s_resume_no, subquery.mem_no, subquery.title, subquery.recruit_no, subquery.mem_recruit_no FROM member m JOIN ( SELECT sr.s_resume_no, sr.mem_no, sr.title, mr.recruit_no, mr.mem_recruit_no FROM site_resume sr JOIN mem_recruit mr ON sr.s_resume_no = mr.s_resume_no ) subquery ON m.mem_no = subquery.mem_no) subsubquery on re.recruit_no= subsubquery.recruit_no WHERE com_no = #{com_no}
